mapper.sql: id,parent_id as parentId,data_type as dataType,key_code as keyCode,value_code as valueCode,category,sort,means,remark, create_date as createDate,creator,update_date as updateDate,updater,del_flag as delFlag
mapper.select: select from sys_dictionary where del_flag = 0 and data_type like CONCAT('%',#{dataType},'%') and key_code like CONCAT('%',#{keyCode},'%') and means like CONCAT('%',#{means},'%') order by data_type asc,value_code asc limit ${(currentPage-1)*pageSize},${pageSize}
select count(1) from sys_dictionary where del_flag = 0 and data_type like CONCAT('%',#{dataType},'%') and key_code like CONCAT('%',#{keyCode},'%') and means like CONCAT('%',#{means},'%')
